# HIDDeviceClient.HIDElementUpdateResult

**Structure**

A class to hold the results of an element update.

## Declaration

```swift
struct HIDElementUpdateResult
```

## Overview

This class is received as the return value from [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDDeviceClient/updateElements(_:timeout:)]. The results of the transactions can be received by subscripting the results object with [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDDeviceClient/ProvideElementUpdate] and [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDDeviceClient/RequestElementUpdate] originally passed to [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDDeviceClient/updateElements(_:timeout:)].

For an example, see [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDDeviceClient/updateElements(_:timeout:)].

## Subscripts

- **subscript(_:)**: Receive the result of a element update.
- **subscript(_:)**: Receive the result of a request element update.

## Update element values

- **updateElements(_:timeout:)**: Provide new update values for, or request current values from, lists of elements.
- **HIDDeviceClient.RequestElementUpdate**: A request to pull the current value from a list of HID elements
- **HIDDeviceClient.ProvideElementUpdate**: A structure that provides values for a list of HID elements.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
